background_description: The aquatic environment features a rocky seabed covered with reddish-brown coral or algae, displaying various textures. Small, light-colored polyps or anemone-like structures are also visible on the rocky surfaces.
explanation: The image clearly shows a Yellow Boxfish (Ostracion cubicus) with its distinctive bright yellow body and black spots. This striking coloration contrasts sharply with the darker, textured coral and rock background, making the animal highly visible and confirming the absence of camouflage.
